https://tmrev.io/movie/44356-Auf der Strecke (On the Line) 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5KZZwNzPmQ7dumUWXP1KrLPq1Xn.jpg A department store security guard is secretly in love with a clerk in the store's bookshop. When he witnesses a seeming rival being attacked in the train, he gets off instead of helping him. Not being able to deal with his bad conscience, his formerly controlled life breaks down. Auf der Strecke (On the Line)
